title: Clarification of TT ranked rewards
body:
I'm getting mixed information :(

Is it gold + or 50 wins in TT in order to get the graves chroma? 

PLease answer!!

replies.body:
>**WHAT'S THIS ABOUT 50 WINS?**
Some players might be confused about a recent Instagram photo indicating 50 wins for a chroma. This requirement is specifically intended for platforms outside of Riot supported regions such as Garena. Some regions do not have 3 ranked queues, so they will receive their third chroma through 50 wins. Sorry for the confusion.

Since we do have the 3 ranked queues (and as of recently ranked TT hours were extended in preparation for end of season rush), it will probably be the gold+ requirement for our region.
